title: Cities Skylines Linux v1.1.1c Tolyak26
description:
Cities Skylines

Release date: 2015
Steam page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/255710/
CPU architecture: amd64
Game version: 1.1.1c (02.07.2015)
Unity3D version: 5.1.1p2



What is new in version 1.1.1c:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixed input issues on Linux making the game unplayable
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Removed taxis displaying in the milestone Unlocking panel, even though they were not available
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixed paradox account unable to remember the user was logged in
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixed the country list of the paradox account registration form to match the list from the PDX account webpage
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixed a few layout issues in the Options panel which caused localized strings to be clipped in several places



Requirements:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ OS version: Ubuntu 12.04 (64-bit) or newer
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+, 3.2GHz
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ RAM: 4 GB RAM
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ GPU: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, 512 MB or ATI Radeon HD 5670, 512 MB
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ HDD: 4 GB available space



Instructions:

1. Download
2. Unpack
3. Run in terminal chmod -R 777 for whole unpacked folder
4. Run in terminal run_game.sh script which will start the game

In case of graphical glitches run the game with command:

"UNITY_DISABLE_GRAPHICS_DRIVER_WORKAROUNDS=yes ./run_game.sh -screen-fullscreen 0"

In case you have Intel HD GPU, game is not officialy supported but might run with workaround command
